ygData.subject: Re: Necro Spells..?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok I am off to free port to try my guild task for Neriak. I have to deliver a message and get one to give to my guild master. Ok I know that I might get
ygData.messageBody:
Ok I am off to free port to try my guild task for Neriak. I have to deliver
a message and get one to give to my guild master. Ok I know that I might get
slaughtered on sight if I go the wrong places, but I need to know how well
Gather shadows invis works. Also does anyone know where this guy is I am
looking for?

This is a list of spells for necros!!!


>> NECROMANCER
>>
>>SPELL DESCRIPTION SKILL MANA
>>RANK 1 (LEVEL 1)
>>Sense the Dead Point to nearest Undead Div 5
>>Invisible to Undead Invisible to Undead Div 40
>>Minor Shielding Add HP & AC self only Abj 10
>>Cavorting Bones Summon Pet Con 15
>>Coldlight Dim Light Div 5
>>Disease Cloud Disease Attack Con 10
>>Lifetap Drain Hp from Target to Self Alt 9
>>Locate Corpse Point to nearest corpse Div 5
>>Siphon Strength Steal strength and add to self Alt 5
>>Reclaim Energy Unsummon Pet for Mana Back Con 5
>>RANK 2 (LEVEL 4)
>>Gate Go Home Alt 70
>>Sense Magic Detect Magic on Item Div 5
>>Endure Cold Add to Resist Cold Abj 20
>>Fear NPC Run Away Alt 40
>>Clinging Darkness Persistent Damage & Slow Target Movement Alt
>20
>>Corpse Bomb ? Con? ?
>>Grim Aura ? Alt 25
>>Numb the Dead Lull Undead: Lower AGRO/Frenzy/Agro Range
>Abj
>> 20
>>Poison Bolt Poison Attack Con 30
>>Leering Corpse Summon Pet Con 40
>>Lifespike Drain Hp from Target to Self Alt 18
>>RANK 3 (LEVEL 8)
>>Ward Undead Direct Damage - Undead Only Evo 30
>>Lesser Shielding ADD HP & AC & MR self only Abj 25
>>Bone Walk Summon Pet Con 80
>>Deadeye See Invisible & Infra Vision Self Only Div
>35
>>Mend Bones Heal Undead Alt 25
>>Shadow Step Mini Random Teleport Alt 10
>>Dark Empathy Heal Other & Damage Self Alt 20
>>Impart Strength Give own strength to other Alt 15
>>Vampiric Embrace Deliver Touch Spell - Lifetap Alt 50
>>Gather Shadows Invisible - Self only Div 35
>>RANK 4 (LEVEL 12)
>>Bind Affinity Set Go Home Point Alt 100
>>Spook the Dead NPC Undead Run Away Alt 10
>>Endure Disease Add to Resist Disease Abj 20
>>Engulfing Darkness Persistent Damage & Slow Target Movement Con
>60
>>Heat Blood Persistent Damage Alt 72
>>Sight Graft See Through Pet Div 10
>>Convoke Shadow Summon Pet Con 120
>>Wave of Enfeeblement AE Radius Lower Strength Alt 40
>>Lifedraw Drain Hp from Target to Self Alt 63
>>RANK 5 (LEVEL 16)
>>Cancel Magic Take Down Magic
>
>
